text: Lucky Lady is a 1975 American adventure comedy drama movie directed by Stanley Donen and starring Gene Hackman, Liza Minnelli, Burt Reynolds, Robby Benson. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox and was nominated for 1 Golden Globe in 1976. == Other websites == * * * Category:1975 adventure movies Category:1975 comedy-drama movies Category:American adventure movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Movies directed by Stanley Donen Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies set in the 1930s Category:Movies set in San Diego
title: Lucky Lady
